General.Name: Crown Lifters Limited
General.Description: Crown Lifters Limited, a crane hiring company, trades in and rents cranes in India. Its fleet includes crawler lattice and telescopic boom, all terrain, rough terrain, aerial platform, and piling rig cranes. The company serves refinery, oil and gas, cement and steel plant, wind energy, thermal and nuclear power plant, fabrication, airports, metros and railways, water and gas pipeline, ports and jetties, pile driving and caging, and dredging sectors. The company was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Mumbai, India.
